meanings.definition: Filled with excessive air or gas.
meanings.sent2: The overinflated tire burst on the bumpy road.
meanings.sent3: The overinflated beach ball bounced uncontrollably in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The overinflated ego of the actor led to his downfall.
meanings.sent5: The overinflated balloon looked ready to float away into the sky.

meanings.definition: Exaggerated or excessively high in value or importance.
meanings.sent1: The overinflated price of the toy made it unaffordable for many families.
meanings.sent2: Her overinflated sense of self-importance annoyed her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The overinflated claim of the product being 'the best in the world' made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The overinflated promises of the politician were soon forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The overinflated importance of the event was evident in the extravagant decorations.
